Smokescreen/Beachcomber:




Smokescreen heard a whistling noise.  Looking around, he saw a somewhat small 
missile heading for the Ark.  He watched as it hit the Ark and explopded 
against the orangish craft's hull.  Activating his com as he saw two more 
missile explosions up on a cliff somewhat surrounding the Ark, he took out 
his electro-distruptor rifle.  <Maximals!  We are under attack!  Perimeter 
guards, converge on my energy signature!> Smokescreen yelled into the com, 
running as fast as he could for the cliff where the Predacons and Cyber Claw 
were.

---

Beachcomber felt the explosion of Injector's missile, not very much though.  
But his suspicious were confirmed by Smokescreen's transmission.  Raising his 
rifle, he charged out of the armory, heading for Smokescreen's signature.
